basic.description:
Seminars offered by regular and visiting faculty on development topics related to their research interests. Consult the departmental homepage for further details of specific course offerings each year.  
NOTE    Taught concurrently with DEVS 809/3.0.
basic.subject: DEVS
basic.title: Topics in Development Studies I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite Level 4 and registration in DEVS MAJ or MED plan
